alert.note: Alert for Cabarrus; Catawba; Davie; Iredell; Lincoln; Mecklenburg; Rowan (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 4:34PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Cabarrus, southeastern Catawba, southwestern Davie, northeastern Lincoln, southeastern Iredell, north central Mecklenburg and western Rowan Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 434 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Statesville to 9 miles northwest of Huntersville. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Statesville, Huntersville, Kannapolis, Cornelius, Mooresville, Davidson, Enochville, Westport, Troutman and Cleveland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cabarrus; Catawba; Davie; Iredell; Lincoln; Mecklenburg; Rowan
